Reviews.Title: “Not good”

Reviews.Content: loud arrived saturday night bar downstairs didnt stop rocking til wee hours 2 person dorm roommate couldnt ready time pretty dirty mice

Reviews.Title: “Blah!”
Reviews.Author: Jae K
Reviews.Content: awful experience walked price gross 6 bed dorm 2 bed dorm fine linens clean bed comfy kitchen disgusting grungy looked hadnt cleaned ages bathrooms okay privacy showers laundry 5 1 load breakfast couple muffins count breakfast issues noise weekends earplugs drowned except couldnt drown heard night staff rude deposit told refund card instead cash check guy attitude low cash credit card info deposit refused couldnt damn reservation forced pay upfront ive hostel hostel change policies stay else sun hostel granville

Reviews.Title: “Ok, if you are the one downstairs in the club until 5 am...otherwise forget it!”
Reviews.Author: cass_sea
Reviews.Content: mistake staying saturday night ill admit dont sleeping 4am walls paper thin hear footstep corridors wearing earplugs didnt help music band playing club 2 floors below vibrated entire building tiny cramped conveniently located walking distance subway suppose revelers club downstairs convenient walk flight stairs recommend else front desk staff helpful friendly

Reviews.Title: “Sufficient for backpackers who aren't too fussy”
Reviews.Author: mazianne
Reviews.Content: stayed night moved permanent private double 1 bunk bed sleeping bottom bunk heat 202 combine body heat warm afraid falling top bunk decided sleep rails border drinks wasnt risking theres pub below cant hear 2nd floor advice quiet ish sleep 2nd otherwise hear floor below cant else 1 night fine short term pitstop

Reviews.Title: “Not the best place to recover from jetlag”
Reviews.Author: melfrommelbourne1
Reviews.Content: ground myslef vancouver flight particularly jetlagged looking comfortable bed hot shower staff appeared uninterested helpful ceased run facilities checked provided limited information dirty terrible linen mattress looked million springs bathroom cleaned provided little privacy hot water supply limited noise downstairs bar echoed throughout hostel doors banged left close muffin breakfast ok fine couldnt bothered fill stomach limited facilities provided considering hot spot central vancouver positive price excessive provided location biggest seller hostel boomer

Reviews.Title: “The management is as incompetent as the staff”
Reviews.Author: JMGreene
Reviews.Content: stayed olympics despite emailing numerous times forgot reserve leaving look 11pm day arrival desk staff possibly helpful shady stayed 6 days choice believe describe stay management return emails embarrassing facility wonderful city
